Fill in this field!
It appears that you don\'t yet have a wallet set up.\n \n In the next dialog, you will be given the option to either scan a QR code of your private key, or enter it as text or by pasting it into the form.\n \n Please click on \"continue\" below to proceed.
In order to secure your funds, you need to set a PIN code.\n\n When you tap \"continue\" you will be asked to enter your new PIN and then asked to verify it.\n\n You will be asked for this PIN whenever you do something potentially risky with your accounts or funds.
